Class ActivitySlashCommand

Namespace: Mewdeko.Modules.Games
Assembly: Mewdeko.dll
Syntax
[Group("games", "Some of mewdekos games!")]
public class ActivitySlashCommand : MewdekoSlashSubmodule<ActivityService>, IInteractionModuleBase

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

Activity(IVoiceChannel, DefaultApplications)

Starts a Discord activity in a voice channel.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("activity", "Launch a discord activity in a voice channel!", false, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task Activity(IVoiceChannel chan, DefaultApplications app)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IVoiceChannel chan

The voice channel where the activity will be launched.
DefaultApplications app

The default application to use for the activity.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Examples

/games activity voicechannel activityname

| Edit this page View Source

SetGameMaster(IRole?)

Sets the game master role.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("setgamemasterrole", "Allows you to set the game master role", false, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireUserPermission(GuildPermission.ManageGuild)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task SetGameMaster(IRole? role = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IRole role

The role to set as the game master role.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Examples

/games setgamemasterrole @role

Implements

Discord.Interactions.IInteractionModuleBase
